thread.title: Harvick returns to South Florida and rides the Everglades
thread.title_full: Harvick returns to South Florida and rides the Everglades

title: Harvick returns to South Florida and rides the Everglades
text:
Harvick returns to South Florida and rides the Everglades 
By Matt Lincoln/CBS12SOUTHWEST RANCHES, Fla. (CBS12) - The last time Kevin Harvick was in South Florida, he was winning the Sprint Cup.Tuesday he was back to promote the upcoming race at Homestead Miami Speedway.And he was taking his first trip to the Everglades. But not really embracing it at first.. He turned down the photo op with a python, and didn't feel great about one with a gator either. The big bad race car driver, didn't want to touch this little guy.But once he got behind the wheel so to speak.Everything became a lot more comfortable.It may not be the number 4 Budweiser Chevy.. but Harvick started to get the hang of driving an airboat. Even a donut celebration was in order.Yes it can get wild out on the track - but it can get even wilder out on the boat. A lesson the reigning champ learned Tuesday.The Ecoboost 400 - the Sprint Cup finale at Homestead Miami Speedway is November 22nd. Harvick is currently 5th in Sprint Cup points. Harvick returns to South Florida and rides the Everglades 
Wednesday, October 21 2015, 12:51 AM
